tool_description: An API showing the latest crypto news out there!
name: New Crypto News
title: New Crypto News

api_list.name: Get All New Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about crypto from a lot of different websites!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://new-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
